short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Discover and learn about the birds in our world! Every day a new bird will be shown before your daily search!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bird of the Day extension gives you the opportunity to familiarise yourself with the birds on our world. Every day when you open your browser you will receive an image of a unique bird, along with a short explanation about it. 
A fun and easy way to get to know the birds of the world, and learn a new one every day! 

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to install the "Bird of the Day" Chrome extension and setting Chrome New Tab search provider to Microsoft Bing as described by the service in the Terms of Use - https://feedlord.com/terms-and-conditions-bird-of-the-day/
and Privacy Policy - https://feedlord.com/privacy-policy-bird-of-the-day/
About us: https://feedlord.com/about-us/
Contact us: https://feedlord.com/
